generated_text:
- road: The paved surface extending into the distance, marked by lane divisions and bordered by sidewalks and parked cars.
- sidewalk: The paved pedestrian path on the left side of the road, bordered by a fence and vegetation.
- building: Multiple residential buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including multi-story structures with windows and balconies.
- fence: A metal fence runs along the sidewalk on the left side of the road, separating the sidewalk from the property.
- pole: A vertical pole is visible on the left side of the image, near the sidewalk.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the sidewalk and in front of some buildings.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the distance.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
